Wisdom: الدِّينُ حُبُورٌ
enWisdom: Religion is [the path to] joy

Wisdom: الدِّينُ نُورٌ الْيَقِينُ حُبُورٌ
enWisdom: Religion is light, certitude is joy

Wisdom: الدِّينُ أَفْضَلُ مَطْلُوبٍ
enWisdom: Religion is the greatest pursuit

Wisdom: الدِّينُ أَقْوَى عِمَادٍ
enWisdom: Religion is the strongest pillar

Wisdom: الدِّينُ [الدُّنْيَا] ذُخْرٌ وَالْعِلْمُ دَلِيلٌ
enWisdom: Religion is a treasure and knowledge is a guide [to it]

Wisdom: الدِّينُ أَشْرَفُ النَّسَبَيْنِ
enWisdom: Religion is the more honourable of the two lineages

Wisdom: الدِّينُ وَالْأَدَبُ نَتِيجَةُ الْعَقْلِ
enWisdom: Religion and good manners are a result of intelligence

Wisdom: التَّيَقُّظُ فِي الدِّينِ نِعْمَةٌ عَلَى مَنْ رُزِقَهُ
enWisdom: Vigilance in religion is a blessing for the one whom it is bestowed upon

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ السَّعَادَةِ اسْتِقَامَةُ الدِّينِ
enWisdom: The greatest felicity is [in] the uprightness of religion

Wisdom: إِذَا اسْتَخْلَصَ اللَّهُ عَبْداً أَلْهَمَهُ الدِّيَانَةَ
enWisdom: When Allah specially chooses a servant, He inspires him with [religious] devotion

Wisdom: حَسَبُ الرَّجُلِ مَالُهُ وَكَرَمُهُ دِينُهُ
enWisdom: The distinction of a man is [by] his wealth but his honour is [by] his religion

Wisdom: حِفْظُ الدِّينِ ثَمَرَةُ الْمَعْرِفَةِ وَرَأْسُ الْحِكْمَةِ
enWisdom: Preserving the faith is the fruit of cognizance and the peak of wisdom

Wisdom: صَيِّرِ الدِّينَ جُنَّةَ حَيَاتِكَ وَالتَّقْوَى عُدَّةَ وَفَاتِكَ
enWisdom: Make religion the shield of your life and piety the preparation for your death

Wisdom: مَنْ رُزِقَ الدِّينُ فَقَدْ رُزِقَ خَيْرَ الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ
enWisdom: One who is endowed with religion is endowed with the good of this world and the Hereafter

Wisdom: مُرُوَّةُ الْعَاقِلِ دِينُهُ وَحَسَبُهُ أَدَبُهُ
enWisdom: The magnanimity of an intelligent person is his religion and his distinction is his etiquette

Wisdom: نِعْمَ الْقَرِينُ الدِّينُ
enWisdom: What a good companion religion is!

Wisdom: يَسِيرُ الدِّينِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Little religion is better than plenty of worldly possession

Wisdom: أَلَا وَإِنَّ شَرَائِعَ الدِّينِ وَاحِدَةٌ وَسُبُلَهُ قَاصِدَةٌ فَمَنْ أَخَذَ بِهَا لَحِقَ وَغَنِمَ وَمَنْ وَقَفَ عَنْهَا ضَلَّ وَنَدِمَ
enWisdom: Indeed the codes of religion are one and its ways are straight, so the one who follows it arrives [at the destination] and gains [success], and the one who stands away from it strays and regrets

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ يُعْطِي الدُّنْيَا مَنْ يُحِبُّ وَمَنْ لَا يُحِبُّ وَلَا يُعْطِي الدِّينَ إِلَّا مَنْ يُحِبُّ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, grants this world to [both] the one whom He loves and the one whom He does not love, but He grants religion only to the one whom He loves

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَعَالَى لَا يُعْطِي الدِّينَ إِلَّا لِخَاصَّتِهِ وَصَفْوَتِهِ مِنْ خَلْقِهِ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Most High, does not give the religion except to His chosen ones and the elite from among His creation

Wisdom: إِنْ جَعَلْتَ دُنْيَاكَ تَبَعاً لِدِينِكَ أَحْرَزْتَ دِينَكَ وَدُنْيَاكَ وَكُنْتَ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنَ الْفَائِزِينَ
enWisdom: If you make your [life in this] world a means of following your religion, you will have saved [both] your religion and your world, and you will be among the successful in the Hereafter

Wisdom: حَصِّنُوا الدِّينَ بِالدُّنْيَا وَلَا تُحَصِّنُوا الدُّنْيَا بِالدِّينِ
enWisdom: Safeguard the religion through [the means of] this world and do not safeguard this world through the religion

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِلُزُومِ الدِّينِ وَالتَّقْوَى وَالْيَقِينِ فَهُنَّ أَحْسَنُ الْحَسَنَاتِ وَبِهِنَّ يُنَالُ [تُنَالُ‏] رَفِيعُ الدَّرَجَاتِ
enWisdom: You must cling to religion, piety and certitude, for these are the best of virtues and through them the lofty stations are attained
